thread.title: Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish
thread.title_full: Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish - San Francisco Chronicle

author: James Ellingworth, Associated Press
title: Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish
text: Photo: Luca Bruno, AP Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton of Britain leads during the Formula One Russian Grand Prix at the Sochi Autodrom, in Sochi, Russia, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015. Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton of Britain leads during the Formula... SOCHI, Russia (AP) — Lewis Hamilton took a huge step toward retaining his Formula One title by winning the Russian Grand Prix on Sunday as his main rival Nico Rosberg failed to finish. Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton of Britain leads during the Formula One Russian Grand Prix at the Sochi Autodrom, in Sochi, Russia, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015. Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton of Britain leads during the Formula... SOCHI, Russia (AP) — Lewis Hamilton took a huge step toward retaining his Formula One title by winning the Russian Grand Prix on Sunday as his main rival Nico Rosberg failed to finish.
